mapper.select: select * from show a left join seat c on (a.show_id = c.show_id) left join cast d on (a.show_id = d.show_id) left join artist e on ( d.artist_id = e.artist_id) where a.show_id = #{asd}
SELECT SHOW_ID FROM SHOW WHERE show_name = #{show_name}
SELECT * FROM SHOW ORDER BY SHOW_START_DAY DESC ,GENRE_ID ASC

SELECT s.show_id, s.show_poster, s.genre_id, s.show_name, s.show_venues, TO_CHAR(s.show_start_day, 'yyyy.mm.dd') show_start_day, TO_CHAR(s.show_end_day, 'yyyy.mm.dd') show_end_day, s.show_address, s.show_status, NVL(r.c, 0) review_cnt, NVL(r.a, 0) grade_avg FROM show s LEFT JOIN (SELECT show_id, COUNT(*) c, AVG(review_grade) a FROM review GROUP BY show_id) r ON s.show_id = r.show_id WHERE INSTR(s.show_name, #{value}) !=0 ORDER BY show_end_day DESC

SELECT a.artist_name, s.show_id, s.genre_id, s.show_name, s.show_venues, s.show_address, TO_CHAR(s.show_start_day, 'yyyy-mm-dd') show_start_day, TO_CHAR(s.show_end_day, 'yyyy-mm-dd') show_end_day FROM show s LEFT JOIN cast c ON s.show_id = c.show_id LEFT JOIN artist a ON c.artist_id = a.artist_id WHERE TO_CHAR(s.show_start_day, 'yymm') = #{yymm} OR TO_CHAR(s.show_end_day, 'yymm') = #{yymm} ORDER BY s.show_start_day
